introduction.heading: Genomel Data Commons
introduction.text: The GenoMEL data commons supports the management, analysis and sharing of human melanoma data for the research community and aims to accelerate discovery and development of therapies, vaccines, diagnostic tests, and other technologies for the treatment and prevention of melanoma. The data commons supports cross-project analyses by harmonizing data from different projects through the collaborative development of a data dictionary, providing an API for data queries and download, and providing a cloud-based analysis workspace with rich tools and resources.

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The data are defined in a generic way by the dictionary. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: Explore Data
buttons.body: The Exploration Page gives you insights and a clear overview under selected factors.
buttons.label: Explore data

buttons.name: Access Data
buttons.body: Use our selected tool to filter out the data you need.
buttons.label: Query data

buttons.name: Analyze Data
buttons.body: Analyze your selected cases using Jupyter Notebooks in our secure cloud environment
buttons.label: Run analysis
